definitions.definition: The state of being actual or real.
definitions.example: The reality of the crash scene on TV dawned upon him only when he saw the victim was no actor but his friend.

definitions.definition: A real entity, event or other fact.
definitions.example: The ultimate reality of life is that it ends in death.

definitions.definition: The entirety of all that is real.
An individual observer's own subjective perception of that which is real.
